meanings.definition: To make less sensitive or aware.
meanings.sent1: The loud noise pocosens my hearing.
meanings.sent2: She pocosens her emotions to avoid getting hurt.
meanings.sent3: The magician pocosens the audience's ability to see the trick.
meanings.sent4: The fog pocosens the view of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The medication pocosens the pain quickly.

meanings.sent1: He only needs a pocosens of sugar for his coffee.
meanings.sent2: A pocosens of kindness can go a long way.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant carried a pocosens of food back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: She added a pocosens of spice to the soup for flavor.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a pocosens of paint to create a beautiful masterpiece.
